Title: Data Moving Plug-in Examples
Description: Examples of usage of the Data Moving Plug-in, of the Mvc Controls toolkit. The Data Moving Plug-in is  an advanced set of controls and tools for Asp.net Mvc.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is a collection of examples, and Visual Studio Templates for the Data Moving Plug-in. The Data Moving Plug-in is a complete commercial controls suite built on top of the Mvc Controls Toolkit. It Contains, Grids, TreeViews, Menus, Forms  and other controls that may be configured with a fluent interface, plus some interaction primitives to build Rich UI Web Applications. The Data Moving Plug-in includes also advanced tools for client/server synchronization, and changes tracking, advanced interfaces for tinyMce, and jQPlot, and an advanced Single Page Application Framework.

The Data Moving Plug-in is a pre-requisite for running all examples contained here. Thus, all examples need an installation of the Data Moving Plug-in.

The examples cover all features included in the product, and the Visual Studio Templates prepare for you  the whole structure of a  Single Page Application based on the SPA framework included in the product.

How to Get the Data Moving Plug-in

The Data Moving my be purchased here. Price data are available here.

You may apply also for a 30 days trial here: we will send you an official request to fill and sign.

You may find more information about the product on the Data Moving Plug-in web site. 

The Data Moving Plug-in Team is Looking for resellers, see here for more details.

How to use the SPA Visual studio Templates

Starting from the 1.2 release available also Visual Studio templates for SPA bases on the ko.routing router instead of the native virtual link based router. When using ko.routing you must install also the corresponding virtual link based template since only the virtual link based templates install also the SPAView and SPAModule item templates. 

Download the .vsix file you would like to install and double-click on it. All visual studio templates are available also on the Data Moving Plug-in Web site.

For the 1.2.0 release:

SPA_Mvc5_Mvc4.vsix installs the Mvc5 and Mvc4 SPA project templates in Visual Studio 2013.

SPA_Mvc5.vsix installs the Mvc5 SPA project template only in Visual Studio 2013

SPA_Mvc5_ko.routing.vsix installs the ko.routing based Mvc5 SPA project template in Visual Studio 2013

SPA_Mvc4_vs2012.vsix installs the Mvc4 SPA project template in Visual Studio 2012

SPA_Mvc4_ko.routing.vsix installs the ko.routing based Mvc4 SPA project template in Visual Studio 2012-13

For the 1.0.7 release:

SPA_Mvc5_Mvc4_1.0.7.vsix installs the Mvc5 and Mvc4 SPA project templates in Visual Studio 2013.

SPA_Mvc5_1.0.7.vsix installs the Mvc5 SPA project template only in Visual Studio 2013

SPA_Mvc4_vs2012_1.0.7.vsix installs the Mvc4 SPA project template in Visual Studio 2012.

For the 1.0.5 release:

SPA_Mvc5_Mvc4.vsix installs the Mvc5 and Mvc4 SPA project templates in Visual Studio 2013.

SPA_Mvc5.vsix installs the Mvc5 SPA project template only in Visual Studio 2013

SPA_Mvc4_vs2010_12.vsix installs the Mvc4 SPA project template in Visual Studio 2012.

 

How to run the Examples

Download the right Visual studio project either from the download area of this web site, or from the Data Moving Plug-in Web site. There are packages for VS 2010-2013 and for both Mvc 3,  Mvc 4 and Mvc 5. 

Then install either DataMovingPlugin5Examples.1.0.5.nupkg or  DataMovingPlugin4Examples.1.0.5.nupkg or DataMovingPlugin3Examples.1.0.5.nupkg on the VS project you downloaded with the procedure detailed both in the product documentation, and here.

Please, don't forget to insert the product key you received with the product in the web.config! Your electronic license contain the instruction to copy, so you need just a copy and past operation.

Enjoy!

Licenses

All examples are licensed under the MIT license, so they can be freely used also for commercial purposes. However, the examples contain also third parties softare that may have different license terms, please verify their license terms before using them in commercial software. Software that might have different license terms is: tinyMce, jQPlot, jQuery blockUI Plugin,  DateBox, and the jQuery Mobile Icon Pack.

Tutorials on the Examples

The Data Moving Plug-in web site contains several step by step tutorials for beginners, and several other demo videos. Available also, live examples you may play with.

Below some of the demo videos:

  • Single Page Applications 1: Manipulating the Client Side Viewmodel. Discover how both the server, with remote commands, and the User, with UI primitives, can manipulate the client side ViewModel.
     
  • Single Page Applications 2: Validation Error Handling. Enhancement to the usual Mvc Client and Server Validation logic, usefull in Single Page Applications: errors bubbling, hidden errors handling, error entities filtering, entity level, and overall model validation.
     
  • Data Moving Plugin Forms: Detail Views, Data Filtering UI, and Undo/Redo Stack. Data Moving Forms provide standard detail and filter views, but can be customized with any Html. Moreover, all actions performed in edit mode can be undone and re-done with the typical editors undo/ redo buttons.
     
  • Data Moving Controls. A Review of all Data Moving out-of-the-box controls.


    Grids on Actual Mobile Devices

     
  • Introduction to the Data Moving Plugin. Notde-to-Node Data Binding, Data Interactions, and TreeViews.


    Connected Lists on a Mobile Phone

    Connected Lists on a Tablet
